Publish.LongDescription:
# Private alpha for Platter.
## Disclaimer: This is an experimental, potentially unstable release. Expect issues and bugs, not everything may work as it should. Always backup your saves. Use at your own risk.
## Please report any issues and share feedback on Discord. Include the following logs:
- `%localappdata%low\Colossal Order\Cities Skylines II\logs\Platter.log` - `%localappdata%low\Colossal Order\Cities Skylines II\logs\Player.log`
Publish.ChangeLog:
Numerous fixes and improvements, including:
- Reworked pre-zone panel: - Refactored: This should improve stability and fix various issues you may have encountered. - New: *Added support for Zone Reorganizer* and other mods that rearrange zones. - New: *Added a "Base Game" filter* that explicitly filters for zones that are NOT part of a pack. - Fixed: Tool panel would stick around after using Platter, then switching to other tools. - Fixed: Platter's filter was showing ALL packs, when not all packs related to zones. Now restricted to zone packs only. - Improved performance: - Significantly improved the performance of parcel updates - Significantly improved the performance of the parcel overlay - Tweaked Parcel overlay, further adjusted size and opacity of the new parcel overlay. - Updated Translations. - Further worked on internal changelog UI, unreleased.
